name: You'll Frighten Me..
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Kuja Pirates

trigger.text: Play up to 1 Character card with 6000 power or less and a Trigger from your hand.

text: If you have 2 or less Life cards, up to 1 of your opponent's active Characters cannot attack during this turn.
